title: I booked a last minute, discounted flight on 'the best US airline' for around $100, and I still can't believe how incredible the deal was

My discounted Alaska flight from New York to Los Angeles took about six hours, and it was far better than I expected. Joey Hadden/Business Insider

I booked a last minute, discounted flight on 'the best US airline' for around $100, and I still can't believe how incredible the deal was

Close icon Two crossed lines that form an 'X'. It indicates a way to close an interaction, or dismiss a notification.
description: Alaska Airlines has been consistently ranked as the best American airline. I just flew basic economy across the country with them, and it was a steal.
